author: kkrouse
msg: - fixed broken checkintests: XmlUnionImpl was always throwing
- string enums in base type are now validated against when adding facets.

author: joes
msg: If $r->document_root was modified, restore it at the end of request.

author: kkrouse
msg: Download external jars to external/lib instead of build/lib so they don't get
deleted on a "ant clean".  Run "ant clean.jars" to clean external/lib
